name: Dance Loop
description:
Music has disappeared from your world.
Travel parallel universes and recollect it together piece by piece. In these different realms you will find special data cells called nodes, which you should punch and break following the rhythm. Move your body in the nodes flow and save the music! Try yourself in 10 game levels to the energetic soundtrack from Yandex Music and Ambidextrous, an electronic musician. Break nodes, hold your hands in the dataflow, avoid the obstacles.

Dance Loop VR is an experimental game from the developer Fibrum where fantastic VR realm becomes alive with electronic music. The soundtrack is partly written by AI and partly by a music artist Ambidextrous. Will you feel the difference?

Game features:

· The rhythm VR game with an original cardio dance moves

· Vivid realms inspired by science fiction of 20th century

· Unusual movement schemes, which combine gameplay with fitness

· Charging electronic soundtrack from Yandex Music
